name: Bartle Quest
description:
Do you want to know more about yourself as a player? Instead of filling questionnaires, start your adventure right away with Bartle Quest!

Bartle Quest is a short 3D action-rpg that can be completed in approximately 30 minutes. The adventure is designed to be accessible to everyone, not just hardcore gamers.

This demo will log your decisions and understand something about you while you play. It's part of a research project based on the Bartle taxonomy of players (check Wikipedia if you want to know more about it: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bartle_taxonomy_of_player_types)

There are 8 levels to play: once completed, you will be asked some more information.

At the end of the demo, you will know your gamer profile just by playing naturally. 

Some data will be uploaded online and will help my research by giving me some data. Don't worry: just follow the in-game instructions and you'll be fine!

After playing the demo, if you really want to help my research, fill this google form about other games' quests and activities.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc5Rilnhlw7A7bTFO96nYxGk-M6WozzLngErsUc

Grab your pad and start this adventure!

For feedback, bugs and comments feel free to contact me!
